original_title: The Trouble with Being Human These Days
overview: Anxious over moral choices, angry at growing wealth inequality, insecure about employment and personal relationships... welcome to life in the world of liquid modernity. This film is a journey through the life and work of Professor Zygmunt Bauman, one of the twenty-first century's most influential thinkers whose ideas help us to understand the trouble with being human these days.
title: The Trouble with Being Human These Days
